    H

    handleBatteryDepletion() - Method in class CellarStealthSystem
    Handles the case, where player's battery depletes during the stealth sequence, recharging it automatically(if player owns Batteries) if possible, ending the game if not
    handleDefeat() - Method in class CombatSystem
    Used to handle the case of player being defeated in combat, giving him the choice to reload his last save(if one exists), or exit the game
    handleDropItem(Item) - Method in class InventoryGUI
    Method used to dropping an item, removing it from the inventory, etc.
    handleItemAction(Item) - Method in class InventoryGUI
    Method used to 'use' the item (Equip/Use button)
    handlePlayerMovement() - Method in class GameGUI
    Method used to handle the player's movement, calculating the speed of his movement
    handleSaveSelected(File) - Method in class GameGUI
    Method used to load the selected state, from the pause menu
    handleSaveSelected(File) - Method in class MainMenu
    Method used to load the selected save file from the load menu
    hasAmmo() - Method in class Weapon
    Decides whether the current weapon has ammo or not
